param.name: artist
param.doc: The artist name.

param.name: album
param.doc: The album name.

param.name: mbid
param.doc: The MusicBrainz id for the album.

param.name: autocorrect
param.doc: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

param.name: country
param.doc: A country name, as defined by the ISO 3166-1 country names standard.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get a list of Buy Links for a particular Album. It is required that you supply either the artist and track params or the mbid param.

param.name: artist
param.doc: The artist name.

param.name: album
param.doc: The album name.

param.name: mbid
param.doc: The MusicBrainz id for the album.

param.name: lang
param.doc: The language to return the biography in, expressed as an ISO 639 alpha-2 code.

param.name: autocorrect
param.doc: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

param.name: user_name
param.doc: The username for the context of the request. If supplied, the user's playcount for this album is included in the response.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get the metadata for an album on Last.fm using the album name or a musicbrainz id. See playlist.fetch on how to get the album playlist.

param.name: artist
param.doc: The artist name.

param.name: album
param.doc: The album name.

param.name: mbid
param.doc: The MusicBrainz id for the album.

param.name: limit
param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

param.name: autocorrect
param.doc: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

param.doc: The artist name.

param.name: mbid
param.doc: The MusicBrainz id for the album.

param.name: limit
param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

param.name: autocorrect
param.doc: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

param.name: festivals
param.doc: Whether only festivals should be returned, or all events.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get a list of upcoming events for this artist. Easily integratable into calendars, using the ical standards.

param.name: artist
param.doc: The artist name.

param.name: mbid
param.doc: The MusicBrainz id for the album.

param.name: limit
param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

param.name: autocorrect
param.doc: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

param.name: order
param.doc: Sort ordering can be either 'popularity' (default) or 'dateadded'. While ordering by popularity officially selected images by labels and artists will be ordered first. This is ignored and set to 'dateadded' when requested as rss.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

param.doc: Specifies a longtitude value to retrieve events for (service returns nearby events by default).

param.doc: The username for the context of the request. If supplied, the user's playcount for this track and whether they have loved the track is included in the response.

param.doc: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

param.name: limit
param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get a list of upcoming events that this user is attending. Easily integratable into calendars, using the ical standard.

param.name: user
param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the friends of.

param.name: recenttracks
param.doc: Whether or not to include information about friends' recent listening in the response.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

param.name: limit
param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get a list of the user's friends on Last.fm.

param.name: user
param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the info of.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get information about a user profile.

param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the loved tracks of.

param.doc: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get the last 50 tracks loved by a user.

param.name: user
param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the neighbours of.

param.name: limit
param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get a list of a user's neighbours on Last.fm.

param.name: user
param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the recent tracks of.

param.name: userecs
param.doc: 0 or 1. If 1, the feed contains new releases based on Last.fm's artist recommendations for this user. Otherwise, it is based on their library (the default).

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get a list of a user's neighbours on Last.fm.

param.name: user
param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the past events of.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

param.name: limit
param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get a paginated list of all events a user has attended in the past.

param.name: user
param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the playlists of.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get a list of a user's playlists on Last.fm.

param.name: user
param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the recent tracks of.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

param.name: limit
param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

param.name: from
param.doc: The date at which the chart should start from.

param.name: to
param.doc: The date at which the chart should end on.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get a list of the recent tracks listened to by this user. Also includes the currently playing track with the nowplaying="true" attribute if the user is currently listening.

param.name: user
param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the shouts of.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

param.name: limit
param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get shouts for this user. Also available as an rss feed.

param.name: user
param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the top albums of.

param.name: period
param.doc: overall | 7day | 3month | 6month | 12month - The time period over which to retrieve top albums for.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

param.name: limit
param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get the top albums listened to by a user. You can stipulate a time period. Sends the overall chart by default.

param.name: user
param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the top artists of.

param.name: period
param.doc: overall | 7day | 3month | 6month | 12month - The time period over which to retrieve top albums for.

param.doc: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

param.name: limit
param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get the top artists listened to by a user. You can stipulate a time period. Sends the overall chart by default.

param.name: user
param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the top tags of.

param.name: limit
param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get the top tags used by this user.

param.name: user
param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the top tracks of.

param.name: period
param.doc: overall | 7day | 3month | 6month | 12month - The time period over which to retrieve top albums for.

param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get the top tracks listened to by a user. You can stipulate a time period. Sends the overall chart by default.

param.name: user
param.doc: The last.fm username to fetch the charts of.

param.name: from
param.doc: The date at which the chart should start from.

param.name: to
param.doc: The date at which the chart should end on.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get an album chart for a user profile, for a given date range. If no date range is supplied, it will return the most recent album chart for this user.
